snippet.title: Balance Breakers Prelude trailer 前導動畫預告
snippet.description:
Take a peek at the prelude trailer of our game - Balance Breakers! 
搶先觀看我們的遊戲 - Balance Breakers 的前導預告片！ 

- 關於 About - 

Balance Breakers is a couch co-op battle party game for 2-4 players. Facing the attacks from opponents and bosses, players have to team up and fight for the most treasures to claim the victory.
Balance Breakers是一款對戰動作派對遊戲。玩家需要組隊對抗敵隊和首領，搶奪最多寶物取勝。

______________________________________________________________________

Go to our Steam page and add the game into wishlist! 
馬上到Steam頁面，把遊戲加到願望清單！
https://www.BalanceBreakers.com/steam/

Like our facebook and instagram to follow our latest news!
讚好FB＋IG，追蹤我們最新動向！
https://www.facebook.com/GamestryLab/
https://www.instagram.com/GamestryLab/

Join our Discord channel to team up and communicate.
加入Discord頻道來一起組隊交流！
https://www.BalanceBreakers.com/Discord/

Want to know us more? Click into our official website!
想知道更多資訊？點進我們的官網吧！
https://www.BalanceBreakers.com/

Subscribe to our youtube channel and like our videos! 
Youtube頻道會上載最新宣傳影片，請Subscribe按Like！
https://www.BalanceBreakers.com/youtube/
